product_name: MorpheHigh Archiever Everyday Essentials Brow Kit
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeMaster your daily brow mood with Morphe's High Archiever Everyday Essentials Brow Kit. Use the precision pencil to create hairlike strokes for natural and filled brows, apply the wax with the brush for lifted, tinted, and tamed brows, or combine all three for detailed and sculpted brows.
details: DetailsIncludesMicro Brow Pencil in Almond (0.003 oz)Supreme Brow Sculpting & Shaping Wax in Almond (0.21 oz)M625 Three-in-One Brow Sculpting Brush (1 ct)BenefitsIncludes a precision pencil, tinted wax & brow brushLightweight, longwearing, high-performing formulasEasy, versatile effectsResearch Results97% of users agreed pencil provides natural, hairlike strokes & precision detailing*97% of users agreed pencil is longwearing*97% of users agreed pencil is easy to use & buildable*97% of users agreed wax tames, sculpts & styles brows**97% of users agreed wax is longwearing**100% of users agreed wax is easy to apply & buildable***Based on a U.S. consumer perception study of 34 consumers.**Based on a U.S. consumer perception study of 32 consumers.Item 2627547How To UseTake brows from naturally filled to bold and defined with the High Archiever Everyday Essentials Brow Kit:For natural and filled brows, use the pointed tip of the Micro Brow Pencil and fill in sparse areas with hairlike strokes.For lifted, tinted, and tamed brows, pair the Supreme Brow Sculpting & Shaping Wax with the M625 Three-in-One Brow Sculpting Brush. Using the precision brush, apply onto brows, building as desired. Using the comb, feather hairs for a fluffed look.For detailed and sculpted brows, combine the above steps and then use the M625 paddle to press down brows.IngredientsBrow Pencil: Rhus Verniciflua Peel Wax, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax (Cera Carnauba, Cire De Carnauba), Beeswax (Cera Alba, Cire D'Abeille), C10-18 Triglycerides, Stearic Acid, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina, Cire Microcristalline), Silica, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, BHT. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77499, CI 77491, CI 77492).Wax: Water (Aqua, Eau), Ceteareth-30, Oleth-20, Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Phytate, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).
how_to_use: Take brows from naturally filled to bold and defined with the High Archiever Everyday Essentials Brow Kit:For natural and filled brows, use the pointed tip of the Micro Brow Pencil and fill in sparse areas with hairlike strokes.For lifted, tinted, and tamed brows, pair the Supreme Brow Sculpting & Shaping Wax with the M625 Three-in-One Brow Sculpting Brush. Using the precision brush, apply onto brows, building as desired. Using the comb, feather hairs for a fluffed look.For detailed and sculpted brows, combine the above steps and then use the M625 paddle to press down brows.
ingredients: Brow Pencil: Rhus Verniciflua Peel Wax

reviews.headline: Not a fan
reviews.comments: I miss the paste they discontinued. Not a fan of this gel.

reviews.headline: Not how they use to make it
reviews.comments: I have purched the brow cream for the last 2 years. This time it is very oily, not pigmented. Looks oily when applying. And does not show color after applying. Very disappointed that they changed it.

reviews.headline: Why !!!!!!
reviews.comments: I loved the old eyebrow pomade. Why did they have to go and combine it with gel . There is no color payoff , the gel doesn't make my eyebrows stay. I hate this !!!

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I used the NYX tame and frame but they no longer sell it so I switched to this. It's too watery and isn't smug or waterproof. I wouldn't recommend.

reviews.headline: I would buy it again
reviews.comments: I love that you can you either products to get results.  I love the color matches my eye brow color perfectly. The brushes really make the application process quick and easy. The pencil is a little questionable for me. I feel like I have to apply alot of pressure to it

reviews.headline: Gamechanger for the Eyebrows
reviews.comments: OMG - this product is a gamechanger for how my brows look. The pencil goes on smooth and easy, no clumping or smearing. It has a great little brow brush that helps to blend the strokes flawlessly. But the real gamechanger is the wax! It looks thick in the jar, but goes on very nicely - with a light coating - not waxy or greasy. The applicator is firm and angled - so it is very easy to use, and the brush on the opposite side of the wax applicator is perfect for getting the brow hairs to behave, helping them to look sleek and styled. I love this product - easily one of the best that I have recently purchased.

reviews.headline: Prettyyy
reviews.comments: Like how sheer and natural it looks on my brows

reviews.headline: I will not be purchasing this product again
reviews.comments: I used to know this product, but this past 2 times that I purchased it, it was just not the same. It is very oily and it is not pigmented at all

reviews.headline: worst product ever don't buy
reviews.comments: waste of money worst product ive ever used in my life i am throwing this away now the color doesnt even come on your skin  unless you want clear streaks on your face i wouldnt buy it

reviews.headline: worst product ever don't buy
reviews.comments: waste of money worst product ive ever used in my life i am throwing this away now the color doesnt even come on your skin  unless you want clear streaks on your face i wouldnt buy it

reviews.headline: Overall Okay
reviews.comments: I got my kit and it was the right color and I like it overall. The only thing I don't like is that my brush was bent. I can't use it. It's got a curve in the bristles that can't be undone unless I find a way to put some weight on it to flatten it out. If anyone from Morphe reads this, you should really think about putting the brush end in a plastic tube to protect it from getting bent from being in a plastic baggie and being stored downside in the box and letting gravity do it's business. Would have been 5 stars if that wasn't an issue.

reviews.headline: I hate this
reviews.comments: The gel Is terrible there is absolutely no  Color

reviews.headline: Love Love Love
reviews.comments:
This is the best eyebrow product I've ever used! I will continue to buy!
Morphe has great products and for a very reasonable price!

reviews.headline: I was warned before I bought it
reviews.comments: I like. Just wish the gel had a slightly stronger hold, but it does the job.

reviews.headline: Best for your buck
reviews.comments: I was spending a lot of money on much more expensive products for my eyebrows Morphe you did it again, your products are amazing infact better then the name brand.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Glides on smooth, love the new brush it comes with. Wish it had the gel that makes it last longer but overall very satisfied

reviews.headline: tinted brow!
reviews.comments: if you like the tinted brow look and not the 2016 bold brow look.. then this is for you... tho it isn't the greatest at a wax laminated hold look... it doesn't bug me because I put brow gel on anyway... but I love this and love the brush

reviews.headline: Perfect for a variety of looks!!
reviews.comments: I honestly loveeee this kit because it came with the wax and brow pencil. I have seen some note that they were upset it was not pigmented like a pomade. PLEASEEE read the packaging!!! It specifically states the intensity of the color payoff for each product! I use the tinted wax for bare face days (i have fully clear eyelashes, eyebrows, body hair, etc.. so i almost always want at least a little brow product) and i use the pencil (sometimes also topped with the wax) for days I want a full, sculpted, beat face. Also: REDHEADS!! the shame almond looks beautiful! i have red hair and extremely fair skin and it works great especially since its a great kit to play around with pigmentation and your styling preference. when i make a mistake, its pretty easy to clean up. NOTE: i advise not diving head first into the wax and applying like it is ABH pomade, because, well, it isn't!! try diff things and find which way works for youuu!!

reviews.headline: Bring brow cream back!
reviews.comments: Grabbed this on accident thinking it was the old pomade formula. This product sucks and is hard to work with. I also feel so gross with this on my face. Disapointed ulta discontinued the brow cream for this garbage.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy again, worst product ever!!!
reviews.comments: I would not buy this product again, simply because of the formula and the longevity of the product, I stepped out on the rain and the product literally washed off. It's not an easy formula to work with, and it does not define brows.

faceoff_positive.comments: I honestly loveeee this kit because it came with the wax and brow pencil. I have seen some note that they were upset it was not pigmented like a pomade. PLEASEEE read the packaging!!! It specifically states the intensity of the color payoff for each product! I use the tinted wax for bare face days (i have fully clear eyelashes, eyebrows, body hair, etc.. so i almost always want at least a little brow product) and i use the pencil (sometimes also topped with the wax) for days I want a full, sculpted, beat face. Also: REDHEADS!! the shame almond looks beautiful! i have red hair and extremely fair skin and it works great especially since its a great kit to play around with pigmentation and your styling preference. when i make a mistake, its pretty easy to clean up. NOTE: i advise not diving head first into the wax and applying like it is ABH pomade, because, well, it isn't!! try diff things and find which way works for youuu!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Perfect for a variety of looks!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I've only tried 3 out of 5 of the items: micro pen, gel, & brush tool. All 3 items are great and I can tell are good quality & held up well. 
Ulta needs to improve their shipping packaging & put in more effort. This is the 2nd item order that came damaged.
faceoff_negative.headline: Product is great! Ulta's Shipping Effort & Packaging Sucks!
